articles.title: Derecognising parties over freebies is anti-democratic: Supreme Court
articles.description: “Derecognition and all is an anti-democratic thing, which I don’t like...It’s a democratic country,” the CJI, presiding over a two-judge bench, said while hearing a plea on the issue.
articles.content: CHIEF JUSTICE of India N V Ramana on Thursday acknowledged that the impact of freebies promised by political parties on the countrys fiscal health was a serious issue but said he was not in favour of… [+5861 chars]

articles.title: 4 Soldiers Killed In Attack At Jammu Army Camp, 2 Terrorists Shot Dead
articles.description: Four soldiers were killed in action and one was injured in a pre-dawn attack on an army camp in Jammu and Kashmir's Rajouri. Two terrorists, who were detected trying to scale a fence to enter the army camp, were shot dead.
articles.content: <li>"Subedar Rajendra Prasad, Rifleman Manoj Kumar, Rifleman Lakshmanan D and Rifleman Nishant Malik succumbed to their injuries making the supreme sacrifice while neutralising 2 terrorists on a suic… [+1934 chars]
